name: fsuper
author: CoorChice
desc: FSuper 支持富文本、圆角、边框、图片、小红点、以及同时设置多达两个子组件，且控制它们的相对位置。
desc_en: FSuper supports rich text, rounded corners, borders, pictures, small red dots, and setting up to two sub-components at the same time, and control their relative positions.

name: fbutton
author: CoorChice
desc: FButton 支持圆角、边框、图标、特效、Loading 模式。
desc_en: FButton supports rounded corners, borders, icons, special effects, and loading mode.

name: fswitch
author: CoorChice
desc: FSwitch 支持设置提示、滑块装饰、阴影以及良好的交互。
desc_en: FSwitch supports setting tips, slider decorations, shadows, and good interaction.

name: fradio
author: CoorChice
desc: FRadio 支持优良的交互特效，以及像吃汉堡 🍔一样简单的多交互状态视图切换构建。你会爱上TA的 ❤。️
desc_en: FRadio supports excellent interactive special effects, as well as a simple multi-interactive state view switching construction like eating a hamburger 🍔. You will fall in love with TA ❤.️

name: ffloat
author: CoorChice
desc: FFloat 生而优雅，支持精准的位置控制。圆角、边框、渐变、阴影装饰三角？应有尽有 😃。
desc_en: FFloat is born and elegant, supporting precise position control. Triangles with rounded corners, borders, gradients, shadows? Everything you need 😃.

name: frefresh
author: CoorChice
desc: FRefresh 虽前所未有的简易，但效果却令人惊叹不已。同时支持配置刷新、加载元素。完备的控制器让你帮助你掌控整个动态过程。
desc_en: Although FRefresh has never been easier, the effect is amazing. It also supports configuration refresh and loading elements. The complete controller allows you to help you control the entire dynamic process.

name: fdottedline
author: CoorChice
desc: FDottedLine 让你用最简单的方式来创建虚线视图吧 👀 ！
desc_en: FDottedLine lets you create the dashed view in the simplest way \uD83D\uDC40!

name: fsearch
author: CoorChice
desc: [FSearch] 为开发者提供了一站式的搜索栏构建服务。支持边框、边角、渐变背景色以及阴影，同时支持任意数量的前缀、后缀动作按钮。提供了精美的 Hint 动画。
desc_en: [FSearch] provides developers with a one-stop search bar construction service. Supports borders, corners, gradient background colors and shadows, as well as any number of prefix and suffix action buttons. Provides beautiful Hint animation.

name: ftoast
author: Changyi
desc: 帮助开发者创建灵活的，简洁的，精美的 Toast。
desc_en: Help developers create flexible, concise and beautiful Toast.

name: floading
author: Changyi
desc: 轻松创建和管理 Loading，支持全局自定义和单次自定义，支持定时消失。
desc_en: Easily create and manage Loading, support global customization and one-time customization, support timing disappear.

name: fbroadcast
author: CoorChice
desc: FBroadcast 帮助开发者在应用内建立一套高效的广播系统，支持粘性广播。
desc_en: FBroadcast helps developer build an efficient broadcast system in the application and supports sticky broadcast
